snippet: Citing the recovering national economy, Standard & Poor’s upgraded the government’s long-term debt outlook and ratified its AA+ credit rating.
abstract: Standard & Poor's upgrades its outlook for long-term debt of United States, citing government's strengthened finances, recovering national economy and some easing of Washington's political gridlock.
lead_paragraph: Citing the recovering national economy, Standard & Poor’s upgraded the government’s long-term debt outlook and ratified its AA+ credit rating.

headline.seo: Standard & Poor’s Raises U.S. Credit Outlook to Stable
headline.main: Standard & Poor’s Raises Its Outlook on U.S. Credit
headline.print_headline: Standard & Poor’s Raises Its Outlook on U.S. Credit
